attributes.action: Herd all excessively obese adults into the Solent to form a land mass to the Isle of Wight
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Use the obese, (so obese they are medically unfit for work), to form a human land reclamation mass - (instead of grave), as a bridge to the Isle of Wight. The country would benefit from the actual useage of these otherwise parasitical beings saving excessive cost for ferries to the Isle of Wight.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
